targets.kdbFunction: { [st;et] ij[select loadroi:avg loadfcstroi, loadni:avg loadfcstni by starttime from loadforecast where starttime within (st;et); select avg loadforecastroi, avg loadforecastni by starttime from fourdayaggrollwindunitfcst where starttime within (st;et)] }[${__from};${__to}]

panels.title: Load Forecast and Forecast Wind Generation - NI and ROI

targets.kdbFunction: 0!select avg imbalancepx, avg netimbalancevol by time:start.date+30 xbar start.minute from minimumimbalance where start within (${__from};${__to})

panels.title: Imbalance Settlement Price and Net Imbalance Volume (NIV)

targets.kdbFunction: { [x] select datetime, priceeur from indexprices where datetime within (${__from};${__to}),auctionname=x, marketarea like (("*"), 4_string[x] )  } [`${auctionname} ]

{?[x;{(not;(null;x))} each cols x; 0b; ()]} 0!select avg surface_shortwave_radiation,  avg cloud_cover by time:observation_time.date+30 xbar observation_time.minute from weather where observation_time within (${__from};${__to}), sym=`${cluster}, forecasttype=`${forecasttype}

{?[x;{(not;(null;x))} each cols x; 0b; ()]} 0!select avg wind_speed by time:observation_time.date+30 xbar observation_time.minute, forecasttype from weather where  observation_time within (${__from};${__to}), sym=`${cluster}
select avg loadforecastroi, avg loadforecastni by starttime from fourdayaggrollwindunitfcst where starttime within (${__from};${__to})
0!select dailyfcst: avg aggregatedfcst by starttime, fcsttype from loadforecast where starttime within (${__from};${__to})
{ [x] select datetime, priceeur from indexprices where datetime within (${__from};${__to}),auctionname=x, marketarea like (("*"), 4_string[x] )  } [`${auctionname} ]

{?[x;{(not;(null;x))} each cols x; 0b; ()]} 0!select avg wind_speed by time:observation_time.date+30 xbar observation_time.minute from weather where observation_time within (${__from};${__to}), sym=`${cluster}, forecasttype=`${forecasttype}

{?[x;{(not;(null;x))} each cols x; 0b; ()]} 0!select avg wind_speed by time:observation_time.date+30 xbar observation_time.minute from weather where observation_time within (${__from};${__to}), sym=`${cluster}, forecasttype=`${forecasttype}
select avg loadforecastroi, avg loadforecastni by starttime from fourdayaggrollwindunitfcst where starttime within (${__from};${__to})
{ [x] select datetime, priceeur from indexprices where datetime within (${__from};${__to}),auctionname=x, marketarea like (("*"), 4_string[x] )  } [`${auctionname} ]
0!select avg aggregatedforecast by starttime from fourdayaggrollwindunitfcst where starttime within (${__from};${__to})

panels.title: Aggregated Wind Forecast & Index Price for ${auctionname}

list.definition: exec distinct auctionname from select distinct auctionname from indexprices
list.name: auctionname
list.query: exec distinct auctionname from select distinct auctionname from indexprices
